author: Published Aug
title: Bird Flu on Dairy Farms May Be Airborne After All | The Transmission | University of Nebraska Medical Center
text:
Scientific American Infectious bird flu virus was found in milk, on equipment, within wastewater and aerosolized in the air on California dairy farms. The H5N1 avian influenza virus can now be found not only in milk and on milking equipment but also in farm wastewater and in the air, say researchers who have been trying to figure out how the virus spreads on dairy farms.
The researchers identified the virus in both large and small aerosol particles in the air on farms affected by bird flu in California, according to a new preprint paper posted on the biology server bioRxiv. ‚ÄúThere is a lot of H5N1 virus on these farms,‚Äù says Seema Lakdawala, an associate professor of microbiology and immunology at the Emory University School of Medicine and senior author of the new study, which has yet to go through scientific peer review. ‚ÄúIt is everywhere. We need to be expanding biosafety measures, biosecurity measures and trying to control where the virus is.‚Äù
The finding‚Äîthat the virus is ‚Äúeverywhere‚Äù‚Äîfits with what has been seen in previously published work, says Richard Webby, who studies host-microbe interactions at St. Jude Children‚Äôs Research Hospital. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs a ridiculously contaminated environment,‚Äù Webby says.

title: Oposi√ß√£o protocola pedido de impeachment de Lula por ligar a√ß√£o de Israel a holocausto
text: Oposi√ß√£o protocola pedido de impeachment de Lula por ligar a√ß√£o de Israel a holocausto O requerimento possui 49 p√°ginas e afirma que o presidente da Rep√∫blica cometeu "ato de hostilidade contra Israel" A oposi√ß√£o ao governo protocolou o pedido de impeachment do presidente Luiz In√°cio Lula da Silva (PT) na C√¢mara. O requerimento, com 139 assinaturas, est√° na mesa de Arthur Lira (PP-AL), presidente da Casa, desde a noite de quinta-feira, 22. Encabe√ßado pela deputada Carla Zambelli (PL-SP), o requerimento deve passar por um aditamento para inclus√£o de mais cinco nomes. O requerimento possui 49 p√°ginas e afirma que o presidente da Rep√∫blica cometeu "ato de hostilidade contra Israel" por meio de "declara√ß√µes de cunho antissemita". No √∫ltimo domingo, 18, Lula comparou a incurs√£o de Israel na Faixa de Gaza com o exterm√≠nio de judeus promovido pela Alemanha nazista. A declara√ß√£o de Lula gerou uma crise diplom√°tica, fator elencado pelos autores do pedido. Segundo os parlamentares, o chefe do Executivo teria comprometido as rela√ß√µes comerciais entre Brasil e Israel e a neutralidade brasileira, crimes de responsabilidade tipificados pela Lei do Impeachment. Por erro t√©cnico no protocolo do pedido, o requerimento que chegou na mesa de Lira abriga 139 assinaturas, sem acumular todos os signat√°rios da medida, segundo Zambelli. Nesta segunda-feira, 26, ser√° feito um aditamento para a inclus√£o das assinaturas dos deputados Pedro Lupion (PP-PR), Giacobo (PL-PR), Sargento Portugal (Podemos-RJ), Alex Santana (Republicanos-BA) e L√∫cio Mosquini (MDB-RO). Zambelli quer incluir tamb√©m a alega√ß√£o de que Lula "procedeu de modo incompat√≠vel com o decoro do cargo", outro argumento para fundamentar o impedimento do presidente da Rep√∫blica. A deputada afirmou que ser√° realizado na semana que vem uma solenidade para o an√∫ncio oficial da iniciativa. - Zambelli √© intimada pelo STF no plen√°rio da C√¢mara e diz ser rea√ß√£o a pedido de impeachment - TSE multa deputada Zambelli em R$ 30 mil por fake news sobre e-T√≠tulo - Impeachment de Lula: Zambelli adia pedido com 122 assinaturas; entenda - Pedido de impeachment de Lula tem troca de farpas entre Gleisi e Zambelli Chama no Zap üëãüèª Receba not√≠cias na palma da sua m√£o. Clique aqui e entre agora mesmo no nosso canal exclusivo do WhatsApp Clique aqui e entre agora mesmo no nosso canal exclusivo do WhatsApp 'Superpoder' de Lira O pedido, a partir de agora, depende exclusivamente de Arthur Lira para avan√ßar. Segundo Fl√°vio de Le√£o Bastos, doutor em Direito Constitucional e professor universit√°rio do Mackenzie, o n√∫mero absoluto de assinaturas no requerimento, em si, "n√£o √© t√£o importante", apesar de indicarem mobiliza√ß√£o pol√≠tica. No fim das contas, como ocorre a partir desta etapa, a abertura do processo de impeachment compete unicamente a Lira, "havendo 50, cem ou mil assinaturas", explica o professor. "√â um poder exclusivo, um 'superpoder', como alguns denominam, do presidente da Casa", disse Le√£o Bastos. Zambelli quer que um ter√ßo da C√¢mara assine o pedido Zambelli afirmou por meio das redes sociais que espera contar com mais ades√µes no requerimento. "Se Deus quiser vamos chegar a 171, que √© um ter√ßo da C√¢mara, um n√∫mero bastante expressivo", disse a deputada no X (antigo Twitter). A maior parte dos deputados que aderiram ao pedido de impeachment √© filiada ao PL, partido do ex-presidente Jair Bolsonaro e principal legenda de oposi√ß√£o ao governo Lula. Mas at√© parlamentares de siglas que integram a base governista, como Uni√£o Brasil, PSD e MDB, constam entre os apoiadores do requerimento. Isso ocorre pois os partidos integram minist√©rios do governo federal, mas os deputados, a n√≠vel individual, atuam na oposi√ß√£o a Lula.

√âtats-Unis, Turquie, France ou encore Royaume-Uni : une intense temp√™te solaire a frapp√© la Terre ce jeudi 10 octobre, provoquant partout dans le monde des aurores bor√©ales, et notamment dans des r√©gions plus m√©ridionales que d‚Äôhabitude, a annonc√© une agence am√©ricaine.
Publicit√© Le pic de ce cycle qui revient tous les 11 ans a entra√Æn√© en mai la temp√™te solaire la plus ¬´ extr√™me ¬ª depuis 2003, provoqu√©e par une s√©rie d‚Äô√©jections de masse coronale (CME) en provenance du Soleil.
La suite apr√®s cette publicit√© Quand ces particules arrivent sur Terre, elles perturbent son champ magn√©tique, avec parfois pour cons√©quence des aurores bor√©ales impressionnantes mais aussi une d√©gradation des communications √† haute fr√©quence, des perturbations pour les satellites et des surcharges sur le r√©seau √©lectrique.
La suite apr√®s cette publicit√© Record atteint en mai dernier Les particules se d√©pla√ßant √† une vitesse de quatre millions de kilom√®tres par heure, cela correspond √† une temp√™te g√©omagn√©tique de niveau 4 sur une √©chelle de 5, selon cet organisme. La temp√™te solaire de mai avait atteint le niveau 5.
√Ä lire aussi Alerte aux aurores bor√©ales en France, faut-il s‚Äôaffoler ? L‚Äôagence f√©d√©rale de r√©ponse aux catastrophes naturelles, la FEMA, d√©j√† sous pression pour g√©rer les cons√©quences de l‚Äôouragan meurtrier H√©l√®ne et l‚Äôarriv√©e de son dangereux successeur Milton, a √©t√© inform√©e, selon Shawn Dahl, tout comme les gestionnaires du r√©seau √©lectrique d‚ÄôAm√©rique du Nord afin qu‚Äôils puissent prendre les mesures n√©cessaires pour √©viter les surcharges.
La suite apr√®s cette publicit√© La suite apr√®s cette publicit√© Dysfonctionnements √©lectroniques En octobre 2003, une temp√™te solaire ¬´ d‚ÄôHalloween ¬ª avait plong√© des pans entiers de la Su√®de dans le noir et endommag√© des infrastructures √©nerg√©tiques en Afrique du Sud.
En mai, des agriculteurs du Midwest, dans le nord des √âtats-Unis avaient observ√© des dysfonctionnements de leurs syst√®mes GPS et la temp√™te avait provoqu√© des probl√®mes sur des transformateurs haute tension, sans perturber massivement le r√©seau √©lectrique, a ajout√© Shawn Dahl. Le niveau orbital de plus de 5 000 satellites avait d√ª √™tre corrig√© en raison des perturbations.

author: APP
title: Three-day mango festival begins today
text: A three-day Family Mango Festival and Exhibition hosted by Sindh Agriculture University, Tandojam, is set to commence from Friday, July 5, at the Pakistan Maritime Museum Karachi. The event has been organized in collaboration with the Pakistan Maritime Museum, TCN Executive Forum and various institutions and farms. The opening ceremony will be held in the evening. Vice Chancellors from public and private universities, progressive farmers, various collaborators and other significant partners will be honorary guests in inauguration ceremony. On the second day, event will continue with a ribbon-cutting ceremony and an exhibition tour at 5 pm, led by Chief Minister Murad Ali Shah. Participants will visit exhibition stalls and engage in extensive networking activities. Following a poster presentation on mangoes, a comprehensive technical session will be held, covering sustainable mango farming practices, value addition, packaging, transportation, and the export potential of Pakistani mangoes. The session will conclude with a dynamic Q&A segment. A panel discussion on the potential, challenges and opportunities of mango cultivation in Sindh, will be moderated by Director of University Advancement and Financial Assistance Prof. Dr. Muhammad Ismail. COMMENTS Comments are moderated and generally will be posted if they are on-topic and not abusive. For more information, please see our [Comments FAQ](/comments-policy)

author: Liu Lican
title: ‚ÄòPassenger drone‚Äô cleared for mass production | China Dialogue
text:
The world‚Äôs first permit to mass produce pilot-less flying passenger vehicles has this week been issued by China‚Äôs Civil Aviation Administration, CCTV reported.
This is also the first production permit for an electric vertical take-off and landing (eVTOL) aircraft, it added.
Such aircraft can fly at low altitudes and have been dubbed ‚Äúflying cars‚Äù or ‚Äúelectric planes‚Äù.
The permitted model can carry two people for 25 minutes, and its current price tag is RMB 2.39 million (about USD 330,000), IT Home revealed.
Many countries are researching, and even trialling, eVTOLs. In February, the world‚Äôs first cross-sea and cross-city eVTOL air route was tested in China, Securities Times has reported. The aircraft, which can carry five people, flew 55km from Shenzhen to Zhuhai, in Guangdong province; it then landed and flew back again, with each leg taking 20 minutes, the Securities Times added. The manufacturing company says the aircraft can fly as far as 250km .
In October 2023, the government issued its Outline for Developing the Green Aviation Manufacturing Industry . The document indicates that ‚Äúsustainable aviation fuel, electric aircraft, and hydrogen aviation are the three key directions of green aviation,‚Äù Beijing News reported. In the next 5-10 years, small, short-distance eVTOL and other electric aircraft will have many application opportunities in urban low-altitude shipping, it added.
However, Time Weekly reported that even if an eVTOL obtains the necessary certificates, local civil aviation authorities still need to set take-off and landing points and routes. This means it is early days for personal commercial use such as ‚Äúair taxis‚Äù.
NewLink Research Institute, a corporate thinktank, has found that, when it comes to long-distance flights in medium and large aircraft, it is more realistic to reduce emissions using sustainable aviation fuel than electric batteries.
Read China Dialogue‚Äôs analysis on the development of sustainable aviation fuels in China .
